name: weather_alerts_snapshot_agent
description: An agent that retrieves and analyzes the top 5 most severe active weather alerts across the United States from the National Weather Service API.

skills.name: Get Severe Weather Alerts
skills.description: Fetch and filter the most critical active weather alerts nationwide, including coordinates for map visualization.

skills.name: Map Alert Zones
skills.description: Enrich weather alerts with geographic coordinates for zone boundaries and create map markers.
